metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0846 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: django-markupfield before 1.3.2 uses the default docutils RESTRUCTUREDTEXT_FILTER_SETTINGS settings, which allows remote attackers to include and read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: django-markupfield: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
